title: Need help to play at Oceania sv
body: I used to play at Oceania , but now i'm back to Vietnam, now I'm playing on Garena but i really want to play at Oceania with my friends. Can you guys help me out plz?

replies.body:
Hey there,

It seems you're posting from an Oceanic account already, all you have to do is install the client and select the correct region (Oceania) and then log in. :)
i did, but it was really lag, but not to my sv. :(
That would be expected due to distance between you and the OCE server, unfortunately your only choice if you wish to play on OCE is to deal with the lag.
Can i transfer this oce account to my garena sea account

Hey there,

Unfortunately OCE > Garena (And the other way around) were a limited time offering by Riot.

Transferring accounts to/from a riot owned shard to/from a non-riot owned shard is more complicated than it may seem and involves a lot more than the press of a button.

Sorry to say, but you'll just have to start over on garena.
